name: StickmanScreenSaver
description:
This is not a game, but a software closer to a screensaver!

In this software, the

》No player is needed!

》Whole game viewing!

》Enjoy the spooky fun of moving ragdolls!

》Transparent background!

》3 characters! (To be updated later)

10 scenes to choose from! (Q button and E build)

》Slow motion! (Spacebar)

》Powerful fighting scenes!

Enjoy! XD

If you like it, or if you have more suggestions, please send me an email!

>hotpad100c@gmail.com<

Follow to get more!
